name: Cactus WimpOut
description:
This game was found at Bin and Jerry’s, a local thrift store. No original box and the instructions were missing most pages. There was a hand-written notebook with the source code.

The program was compiled as best we could, but there were some issues because it wasn’t originally written in English. Or Spanish, French, German, Swiss, Russian, Mandarin, Japanese, Korean, Bokmal, Afrikaans, or Portuguese.

If you have any issues with this please reach out to us, as we might be struggling with similar symptoms.

From what we can tell the controls are fairly intuitive. Mouse and left click to interact. Roll your cubes. Lock them in by clicking them, they’ll turn blue. Then roll, or throw, the remaining cubes. Yellow cubes can be undone, Blue cubes cannot be undone. Red cubes belong to the enemy!
Choose Wisely. Build up your damage by rolling dice combos.  If you roll no damage you get a ZONK! and lose all of your built-up power.
Select your friends and submit to the Roll of the Cubes!

---

If you have information about this game please join us on our discord. https://discord.gg/uuzWSfUyq4
